channel.title: What do you think makes your music unique?
channel.description:
I don't know if this has been asked before but here goes!
What is it about your music that makes it *your* music?
For me, it's the increasing usage of what i like to call 'transcendent progressions'. In a way, the chords put off a divine energy that makes my music special.
*also my abuse of pianos lol*
:slight_smile:

item.title: What do you think makes your music unique?
item.dc:creator: A_L_E_X
item.description:
I Do many genres and add my touch to them. I think just your signature style is important.

I love future bass so much but I try to make mine different than everyone else. Just like Louis Child and their different approach on Future bass, I want to be different.

I don’t know really what im saying lol but yeah.

item.source: What do you think makes your music unique?

item.title: What do you think makes your music unique?
item.dc:creator: Twizard
item.description:
Despite the genre, I think what makes my music unique is the way how I make it, and the drums and bass (drum and bass, haha). First I start off with something that can happen on accident, not a drum, but a melody/bass or something else. After that, I’m making an intro, Build etc. then, in the drop, I use a sample pack, choose a percussion loop and chop it up, and make the drums on my one. In the drop I also use 3-8 basses with automation. I make the drums myself, most of the time with the kick 06 from the superfuildy sound pack. And a snare most of the time from a sample pack. I also think that the way I make my drums are unique in this community, I don’t know how to explain but if you want to hear it, you can go to my soundcloud and listen “claustrophobic”. Etc.

Read full topic
item.source: What do you think makes your music unique?

item.title: What do you think makes your music unique?
item.dc:creator: FunKmasTahh
item.description:

item.title: What do you think makes your music unique?
item.dc:creator: El1011
item.description:
My stuff is so unique no one’s ever heard it before and no one but me ever will because I rarely post

But actually tho, I at least try to be unique. Tho I often see myself using ideas n structures from other artists I like, I think it’s at least different from most of the stuff around here (granted I’m sure most everyone else thinks something similar lol)
